#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
bool IsPalindrome(int n,int arr[20],int i)
{
	if(n==0)
	{
		int k=0;
		i--;
		while(k<=i)
		{
			if(arr[k]==arr[i])
			{
			  k++;
			  i--;
			}
			else return false;
		}
		return true;
	}
	
	arr[i]=n%10;
	i++;
	n=n/10;
	return IsPalindrome(n,arr,i);
}
int ReverseNumber(int n,int arr[20],int i)
{
	if(n==0)
	{
	  int k=i-1;
	  int j=0;
	  int number=0;
	  while(j<i)
	  {
	    number=number+arr[j]*pow(10,k);
	    k--;
	    j++;
	  }
	  return number;
	}
	
	arr[i]=n%10;
	i++;
	n=n/10;
	return ReverseNumber(n,arr,i);
}

void Palindrome(int arr[],int n)
{
   int i=0;
   int number=0;
   int a[20];
   while(i<n)
   {
     int count=0;
     number=arr[i];
     while(!IsPalindrome(number,a,0))
     {
       number=number+ReverseNumber(number,a,0);
       count++;
     }
     cout<<count<<" "<<number<<endl;
     i++;
   }
}
int main()
{
int n,k;
int arr[105];
cin>>n;
k=n;
int i=0;
while(k)
{
cin>>arr[i];
i++;
k--;
}
Palindrome(arr,n);
return 0;
}
